column1: '''''Amon Hen'' 70''' is the seventieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)
[[Christopher Tolkien]]'s article "'Moria Gate'...Another Look" includes a quote from [[Letter to Rayner Unwin (12 October 1972)
